data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Plovdiv with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Plovdiv, Bulgaria

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Plovdiv, Bulgaria need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 50 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Plovdiv, Bulgaria today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Over 17.62 percent of the people of Plovdiv are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, 0.4% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, help the people of Plovdiv, Bulgaria to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Plovdiv, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.section_summary:
the state of Plovdiv, Bulgaria has a population of 666,400.

We estimate Plovdiv has 13,205 people who might know Jesus, 535,745 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 117,450 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 50 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Plovdiv, Bulgaria by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
